High Quality - Adopting thickened PVC materials to manufacture this yoga ball, premium quality provide with better using experience and longer service life. Perfect Fitness Gift Pack - Hope our premium balance ball provide with better using experience for you, bring relaxation and help to your life and work. It is a good gift choice for friends, family, colleagues. Easy to Inflate and Store - Exercise ball comes with an air pump, so you do not need to purchase the pump individually. Our workout ball is easy to inflate and deflate, and it just take minutes to pumped up by hand. The yoga ball can be stored in a bag or box after deflating, taking no places at all. Variety of Colors and Sizes - The fitness ball has 5 colors and 5 sizes for selecting. Colors are gray, black, pink, blue and purple. Sizes are 18IN, 22IN, 26IN, 30IN and 34IN. Exercise ball of different colors and sizes has the same quality, you can choose as you like and need. Slip Resistant and Anti-Burst - Our yoga ball is made with thickened and durable PVC material, covered with matte film, rating up to 600lbs, perfectly and stably support your body when doing workout or sitting on. Premium quality makes you no worry about losing shape or bursting during the workout. Versatile Exercise Ball - You can use the exercise yoga ball to improve your flexibility and stability, suitable for Pilates, yoga, core training, physical therapy and pregnancy birthing, etc. The great resilience can better protect the hip, back and spine, so you can use this yoga ball chair in office and at home.Item Diameter: 26 Inches.
